overview: A special program includes self-made retro music videos and ads, along with classic MTV ads, airings, and commercials. A throwback to the classic 80s and 90s MTV programming using newer Indie/pop/alternative/light rock music, classic and new retro ads, and that fine vibe of Music Television. Sit back, relax, and view Thomas MTV late at night and feel nostalgic about what the channel should have continued to be.
tagline: That fine vibe of Music Television
title: Thomas MTV: Broadcast One
